Translations.Text: Recall ut Abraham dictus to his patris Azar Quam vos worship statues deus? Ego vide ut vos tuus people iit far astray
Nos showed Abraham marvels de caelum terra beatus eum certainty
When nox fell he vide shining planet Maybe hoc est my Dominus he dictus. When it disappeared he dictus ego non like (deus) disappear
When he vide moon rising he dictus Maybe hoc est my Dominus! When it disappeared he dictus my Dominus guides me ego est strayers
When he vide sun rising he dictus Hoc est my Dominus. Hoc est biggest. when it set he dictus O my people ego denounce tuus idolatry
Ego devoted absolutely Unus initiated caelum terra; ego nunquam est idol worshiper

His people argued eum. He dictus Perfecit vos argue me DEUS He guided me? Ego non habet fear de idols vos set Nihil happen me unless my Dominus testimentum it My Dominus knowledge encompasses totus things. Vos non take heed
Why ego fear tuus idols? est vos est afraid abinde vos worship DEUS idols est utterly powerless help vos! Quae side est deserving de security si vos know
